plot: The beginning of the team "The Lovely Angels" aka "Dirty Pair" and the growing pains of this new team.
opening_theme: "Kagirinai Answer" by Matsumoto Rica & Kouda Mariko
"Thrill ni Koishite" (スリルに恋して; In Love with the Thrill) by Rica Matsumoto
"Honki ni Shinaide" (本気にしないで; It Isn't Serious) by Mariko Kouda
ending_theme: "Kimi ga Daisuki" (キミがダイスキ; I Love You) by Mariko Kouda
"Kokoro de Mitsumeteru" (心で見つめてる; I'm Staring at Your Heart) by Rica Matsumoto
